snippet.title: SUPER BOMBERMAN R PS4® ,Xbox One,Steam (PC) Promotion Trailer (ESRB)
snippet.description:
SUPER BOMBERMAN R is coming to PlayStation®4、Xbox One、Steam（PC）!
Battle against rivals from all around the world!
Check out the enriched Story Mode! Play with friends in Battle Mode! Jump into the competitive Grand Prix mode for a team-versus-team battle!
Many new chracter are coming too!

SUPER BOMBERMAN R Official Website
https://www.konami.com/games/bomberman/r
